overview: In a Gay-Shop two guys happen to meet Dennis Kramer, the star of A SPANISH FANTASY (Ikarus 1). Without hesitation, all qualities of our dreamboy are checked out and after a first hot fuck Dennis has a lot of juicy stories and adventures to tell. Experiences he made in Spain during the shooting of his recent movie The same evening they meet a few other horny guys at the Crazy Club - and again a steaming hot adventure begins... until the white cream flows all over their sweaty bodies.
title: Images of Ikarus
